details.product_descriptions: Panasonic LUMIX Mirror less Micro Four Thirds lenses deliver a no-compromise approach to optical performance for modern interchangeable camera enthusiasts and professionals. This newly refreshed 35-100mm F2.8 X Series lens features Panasonic's Nano Surface Coating and its highest standards of detail and sharpness. Built for the outdoors, this professional grade metal body lens features a splash / dustproof / freeze proof design when mounted on a compatible LUMIX G Mirror less camera. Featuring Power O.I.S. optical image stabilization compatibility with 5-Axis Dual I.S. 2.0 (Image Stabilization) you'll shoot with unprecedented hand-held stability across both video and still. Make the switch from bulky DSLRs to the smaller, lighter, more compact Mirror less Micro Four Thirds system cameras and lenses from Panasonic LUMIX. (70-200mm 35mm Camera Lens Equivalent).

details.product_descriptions: Experience the possibilities with the RF 24-70mm F2.8 L is USM lens. Designed for the EOS R full-frame mirrorless camera system, This compact L-series lens combines a bright f/2.8 maximum aperture with a standard focal length zoom range, making it a versatile, all-purpose lens for all types of photography ventures. From portraits and landscapes, to travel and everyday moments, The RF 24-70mm F2.8 L is USM is engineered to cover a range of subjects extending from 0.69 ft./0.21M (wide) to 1.25 ft./0.38M (telephoto). enjoy enhanced video performance, especially when tracking moving subjects, thanks to Canon?s Nano USM technology for accurate and silent AF, and reduced focus breathing for more seamless focus transitions. Plus, you can ensure your images stay sharp and steady ? Whether shooting handheld or in poorly-lit situations ? with up to 5 stops* of shake correction. For an added layer of protection, The RF 24-70mm F2.8L is USM also features a dust- and weather-resistant construction with a fluorine coating, helping keep this powerful lens safeguarded wherever you go.

details.product_descriptions: Geneinno S1 Titan Underwater Drone - 150 M Tether Bundle The Geneinno T1 is one of the world's first diving drone equipped with robotic arm (not included), yet it's the deepest (492ft) diving drone with 4K camera. Diving up to 492ft with various extension supports, everyone can explore the ocean with endless possibilities. This bundle contains the 150m (492ft) tether. Share photos of your scuba diving sessions, your underwater artsy pictures and videos or simply capture your best moments in the water with Geneinno Titan T1 Underwater Drone. Titan's algorithm helps you easily guide your drone with agility, even with demanding deep dives and strong current. The Titan runs deeper than most drones on the market. The 4 horizontal and 2 vertical thrusters offer a smooth and precise swim. The GeneRov App to Become an Underwater Pilot You can follow your drone's path with accurate precision at all times on the GeneRov app on your smartphone or tablet. Its game-like control system is very simple to navigate using the included remote controller and your smartphone. High Performance & Robust Construction Its ultra-durable and anti-corrosion resistant construction makes it able to withstand water pressure up to 492 feet, giving you the opportunity to capture amazing underwater photos and videos with its advanced professional deep sea starlight level 4K camera equipped with a 160 angle lens. Enjoy every detail and color thanks to the best underwater camera quality that creates cinematic 4K HD videos and 8 MP photos. The Titan has a 360 degree movement capacity which enhances stability and flexibility underwater. Its 9000 mAh battery, which lasts up to 4 hours, gives you plenty of time to enjoy epic underwater adventures. Features

datas.product: Sony Alpha a7S III Mirrorless Digital Camera (Body Only) ILCE7SM3/B + 64GB Memory Card + 2 x NP-FZ-100 Battery + Corel Photo Software + Case + Card Reader + LED Light + More (Renewed)

about_this_item: Bundle Includes: 1 x Sony Alpha a7S III Mirrorless Digital Camera (Body Only), 1 x SanDisk SecureDigital 64GB Extreme PRO Memory Card, 2 x NP-FZ100 Rechargeable Lithium-Ion Battery, 1 x Corel Photo Software With PhotoMirage, AfterShot, Painter Essentials, PaintShop Pro, and Video Studio, 1 x Large Padded Case, 1 x NP-FZ100 charger, 1 x Memory Card Reader, 1 x Mini Portable LED Video Light , 1 x Micro HDMI Cable, 1 x Deluxe Cleaning Set, 1 x 12 Inch Flexible Tripod, 1 x Memory Card Wallet

Optimized video, optimized sensitivity, optimized speed, the Sony Alpha a7S III raises the bar for what a full-frame mirrorless camera is capable of. A revised 12.1MP Exmor R BSI CMOS sensor and updated BIONZ XR image processor offer faster performance, improved noise reduction, and a wider dynamic range, along with UHD 4K 120p video recording and internal 10-bit 4:2:2 sampling.

Video is the primary application of the a7S III, and improvements to the sensor and processor enable faster readout speeds and greatly reduced rolling shutter, along with high-bitrate internal recording, 16-bit raw output via the full-size HDMI port, and flexible control over motion with variable frame rate selection. The a7S III also does away with recording time limits and incorporates HLG for direct HDR production as well as S-Log2/S-Log3 gamma profiles for advanced HDR production.

The updated sensor design also brings improved autofocus performance via 759 phase-detection points, which offer intelligent subject tracking and Real-time Eye AF to ensure critical focus on moving subjects in all recording modes. The sensor and BIONZ XR processor also facilitate impressive sensitivity, with an expanded range from ISO 40-409600, as well as fast 10 fps continuous shooting for up to 1000 consecutive raw frames.

Key Features: 12MP Full-Frame Exmor R BSI CMOS Sensor - UHD 4K 120p Video, 10-Bit 4:2:2 Internal - 16-Bit Raw Output, HLG & S-Log3 Gammas - 759-Point Fast Hybrid AF - 9.44m-Dot QXGA OLED EVF - 3.0' 1.44m-Dot Vari-Angle Touchscreen - 5-Axis SteadyShot Image Stabilization - Extended ISO 40-409600, 10 fps Shooting - Dual CFexpress Type A/SD Card Slots.

Item details.Included Components: Battery Charger, Tripod, Shoulder Strap, Battery, HDMI Cable, Body Cap, Eyecup, Shoe Cap

details.product_descriptions: Optimized video, optimized sensitivity, optimized speed, the Sony Alpha a7S III raises the bar for what a full-frame mirrorless camera is capable of. datas.product: Nikon D7500 DSLR Camera with 18-140mm Lens (1582) + 64GB Memory Card + Case + Corel Photo Software + EN-EL 15 Battery + Card Reader + HDMI Cable + Cleaning Set + Flex Tripod + Memory Wallet (Renewed)

about_this_item: Bundle Includes: 1 x Nikon D7500 DSLR Camera with 18-140mm Lens, 1 x SanDisk SecureDigital 64GB Extreme PRO Memory Card, 1 x Camera Bag, 1 x Corel Photo Software With PhotoMirage, AfterShot, Painter Essentials, PaintShop Pro, and Video Studio, 1 x EN-EL15 Battery, 1 x Memory Card Reader, 1 x Micro HDMI Cable, 1 x 6AVE Electronics TM Cleaning Set, 1 x 12 Inch Flexible Tripod, 1 x Memory Card Wallet

Designed as a true all-arounder, the Nikon D7500 is a DX-format DSLR offering a versatile feature-set to appeal to photographers and videographers alike. Based on a 20.9MP CMOS sensor and EXPEED 5 image processor, this multimedia maven avails an 8 fps continuous shooting rate for up to 100 consecutive JPEGS, a native sensitivity range to ISO 51,200 that can be expanded up to ISO 1,640,000, and 4K UHD video and time-lapse recording capabilities.

Balancing the performance attributes, the D7500 is also characterized by its sleek profile and monocoque construction that is comfortable and easy to handle. This physical design is also fully weather-sealed to permit working in harsh environmental conditions. In addition to the pentaprism optical viewfinder, a rear 3.2' 922k-dot touchscreen is also featured, and has a tilting design to benefit working from high and low shooting angles.

The DX-format 20.9MP CMOS sensor is paired with the EXPEED 5 image processor to provide an esteemed mixture of high sensitivity, nuanced image quality, and fast overall performance. At native values, a sensitivity range from ISO 100-51200 permits working in a broad array of lighting conditions, and can be further expanded to ISO 50-1640000 (Lo 1 to Hi 5) to handle the most challenging of situations.

Key Features: 20.9MP DX-Format CMOS Sensor - EXPEED 5 Image Processor - 3.2' 922k-Dot Tilting Touchscreen LCD - 4K UHD Video Recording at 30 fps - Multi-CAM 3500FX II 51-Point AF System - Native ISO 51200, Expanded ISO 1,640,000 - 8 fps Shooting for Up to 100 Frames - SnapBridge Bluetooth and Wi-Fi - 180k-Pixel RGB Sensor and Group Area AF - AF-S DX 18-140mm f/3.5-5.6G ED VR Lens

datas.product: Aputure Nova P300c 300W RGBWW LED Soft Light Panel

about_this_item: STUNNINGLY BRIGHT: The Nova P300c is capable of outputting over 9,000 lux, at a distance of 1 meter, while maintaining a wide 120-degree beam angle. By combining this intense output with the wide beam angle of a soft light source and 0-100% stepless dimming control, the P300c can easily fill large areas, allowing you to control the ambient lighting of your entire scene instantly

INCREDIBLY WIDE CCT RANGE: The Nova P300c features the most extensive expanded bi-color range of any Aputure light, capable of producing white light from 2,000K to 10,000K. The P300c also features the ability to adjust the white light�s green-magenta shift while in CCT mode, allowing you to match ambient lighting or manipulate the scene to your choosing

SUPERIOR COLOR RENDITION: Using a unique blend of color-accurate LEDs in this newer LED chipset, the Nova P300c achieves a tungsten SSI score of 85, and a D55 daylight SSI score of 74, outperforming equivalent industry-standard lights. Plus, like all Aputure lights, the Nova P300c produces impeccable CRI and TLCI values of 95+ � even with a color temperature range of 2,000 to 10,000K

FULL-COLOR TUNABILITY: The Nova P300c using an RGBWW chipset that can produce more than 90% of the colors within the Rec.2020 color space. It features HSI, RGB, and industry-standard X,Y color controls, allowing for up to 1 billion color combinations and precise color matching. It even has a built-in preset library of over 300 industry-standard gels, for ease of access and fast-paced shooting environments

COMPACT, ADAPTABLE DESIGN: The Nova P300c utilizes a built-in power supply to support its 300W light engine, reducing the overall weight of the fixture, and simplifying the user experience. The P300c also utilizes a lightweight aluminum shell and yoke, and the same dual junior/baby pin featured on the Spotlight Mount, making it compatible with nearly any stand or rigging hardware
details.product_descriptions: Fully tunable CCT from 2,000K to 10,000K Tunable Green-Magenta Adjustment in CCT Mode RGB color tunability 300+ industry-standard gel presets built-in 15 built-in lighting FX Stepless dimming from 0 to 100% Onboard 5-pin DMX512 interface Compatible with SidusLink app Extendable control box

The optical system features a construction of 11 groups and 14 elements, each using one of the three types of lens elements, aspheric lens, ED lens and super ED lens, including the large aperture high precision aperture lens, achieving high image quality equivalent to single-focus lenses from wide angles up to standard focal distances. As a result, the lens demonstrates extremely high performance from the center all the way to the edges. The lens adopts an inner focusing method, reducing the weight of the focus lens and achieving fast and near-silent AF by driving focusing using a linear motor

an aspherical lens and 3 ED (Extra-low Dispersion) lenses effectively suppress both axial chromatic aberration and chromatic aberration of magnification

details.product_descriptions: The Panasonic LUMIX S PRO S-R70200 70-200mm F4 Telephoto lens with O.I.S. provides high-resolution, high-contrast images across the entire zoom range making it perfect for portraits to sports. The Panasonic LUMIX 5-Axis Dual I.S. (Image Stabilizer) 2 [*1] system can be used with the LUMIX S PRO as a lens for a full-frame mirrorless camera system. LEICA Certified to Leica standards, this Telephoto Lens is an interchangeable Full Frame L-Mount.The O.I.S. (Optical Image Stabilizer) in the lens effectively compensates for hand-shake movement, making it easy to shoot without a tripod. This Panasonic LUMIX S PRO lens offers high-precision Auto Focus to capture every photo opportunity. The focus clutch mechanism enables both instant AF/MF switching and accurate manual focusing. Focus breathing is suppressed making it an excellent choice for video recording.Camera performance, lightweight construction, and Dust/Splash*/Freeze-Resistant Design are some of the features you'll enjoy while shooting with the Panasonic LUMIX S Series lens.DISCLAIMERS: [1] 5-Axis Dual I.S. 2 can be used with the camera LUMIX S1R and S1, as of February 1, 2019. [2] Based on the CIPA standard [Yaw/Pitch direction: focusing distance f=200mm, when LUMIX S1R is used.

For video recording, the HC-X2 supports 4:2:2 10-bit 4K 30p/25p internal video recording and the new, high-efficiency HEVC codec, with with a wide variety of recording formats for the best selections such as Super Slow Motion (120/100 fps) and VFR (2 to 60 fps). about_this_item: STUNNING VIDEO QUALITY  The Canon CR-N300 PTZ camera delivers advanced performance and outstanding 4K 30p and Full HD 60p video output thanks to a 1/2.3' CMOS sensor, DIGIC DV 6 image processor, and Hybrid AF for fast, reliable, and precise auto focus
aspheric lens elements minimize aberrations over entire zoom range

specification.Included Components: Installation Guide, Warranty, Safety Wire with Screw, Infrared Remote Controller with Battery, AC Adapter, AC Cable, Camera Body, Safety Wire, Mounting Plate with Screw See more

details.product_descriptions: Enjoy professional performance and video quality with the Canon CR-N300 PTZ camera. Designed for professional use in a range of settings, the CR-N300 PTZ camera delivers amazing 4K 30p and Full HD 60p video output thanks to a 1/2.3' CMOS sensor, DIGIC DV 6 image processor, and Hybrid AF for fast and precise auto focusideal for churches, broadcasting, video conferencing, lectures, and more. Featuring a 29.3mm lens with OIS, the CR-N300 features 20x optical zoom with a 29.3mm to 601mm focal range and f/2.8 to f5.6 aperture range for capturing expansive events. Equipped with a motorized PT (Pan, Tilt) drive mechanism with variable .2 - 300/sec incremental Pan speed and .2 - 170/sec incremental Tilt speed, the CR-N300 PTZ streaming camera lets you change the camera's position remotely to follow the action or capture a specific angle. Capture impressive video with blurred background, sporting events, low light situations, and staged subjects with Portrait, Sports, Low Light, and Spotlight modes. The PTZ camera also features multiple connectivity options, including USB, IP via RJ-45, SDI, and HDMI, for easy integration with a range of systems, professional workflows and protocols, such as NDI|HX2, Standard, and Canon SX. It also includes a 3.5mm mini jack mic terminal and serial RS-422 terminal for third-party controllers. The RC-IP100 controller lets you control the CR-N300 by IP, infrared, USB, and Wi-Fi, with control of up to 100 cameras and presets. Windows and Mac-compatible, the CR-N300 software features the Camera Search Tool for camera setup and configuration. Plus, the Add-On Application System enables camera-direct installation and use of paid applications without the need for a computer. Automatically track the speaker or other subject during live events with the Auto Tracking application and use the Auto Loop app for automatic repeat PTZ camera staging movements during event broadcasts, as well as in the production of TV commercials and movies.

details.product_descriptions: A handheld 600mm full-frame prime in a class of its own. Powered by a size-reducing Phase Fresnel element, the lens is just 11 inches in length and weighing 3 lbs. Ideal for bird, wildlife, motorsport and aircraft photographers. Pack lighter, react faster and cover more distancewithout using a tripod or monopod. Premium S-line optics deliver spectacular clarity, advanced VR image stabilization keeps handheld shots steady and all-weather durability ensures you can go wherever the action takes you.
